page.title: 03POPULATION ASHBY M PEATLING
page.content:
The l98l population census gives Ashby Magna as having 252 inhabitants and Peatling Parva l49, whereas the l985 gives 265 Ashby and l38 for Peatling. The overall population has thus been maintained.
The majority of the adult population work outside the villages and commute daily to nearby towns and cities.
In the past year there have been 4 deaths and 2 births in Ashby Magna, and todate there are roughly l8 old age pensioners.
The majority of the population of Ashby Magna are aged between 3O and 5O with growing and grown families.
